channel.title: Posts on Write​_
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Write​_

item.title: Anotherrr archive
item.description: Back in 2021, I used to have this website called anotherrr.web.app, made with a Static Site Generator I made myself. Due to the horrible codebase, it has since become adandoned.

item.title: Why I made a website
item.description: Short answer: why not? The longer answer is me waxing poetic. I’ve made a website long long ago, back in 2021.

item.title: Diving headfirst into the Fediverse
item.description: You may have heard of the emerging social media platform Mastodon. If you happen to pay even more attention, you may have also heard of those called Misskey, Pixelfed, Peertube, and such.

item.title: How your instance admins can vibe-check other instances in the Fediverse
item.description: You might already know how to vibe-check users and instances as a Fediverse user. But there are tons of bad instances out there.

item.title: Vibe-checking in the Fediverse as a user
item.description: Woohoo! You’re in your Fediverse instance, and… OH NO! You just saw something that makes you want to bleach your eyes, and rip them eyeballs out of their sockets, and bleach them again!

item.title: An update
item.description: Hi. Let’s see, my last post here was back in 28 Jan 2024. It’s been four months! I just finished polishing it up yesterday with some minor design changes.

item.title: About
item.description: I dunno who’d be interested enough to view this page — or heck, even this website — but if you truly are curious then feel free to scroll through all this meta stuff.

item.title: My first post
item.description: I’m just starting out and making this cool new Hugo website as a blog teehee. This is called My First Post because that’s what the quickstart told me to call it :D.
